abilities.description: Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 8 seconds.

name: Mirror Shield
description: The shield that long ago robbed the old one of his first memories.
tips: Best shared to your hard carries as the Echo Shield will block and reflect any single-targeted spell back to its caster, preventing them from getting disabled easily.
Because Mirror Shield has a higher priority than Linken's Sphere and both items will simultaneously block a spell, it is wise to give this item to an another allied hero instead.
You can also share a Mirror Shield to your supports if they have a powerful teamfight spell especially those that are channeled.
